thread.title_full: Nice stay at the Hilton midtown - Review of New York Hilton Midtown, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: WendySolon_OH
title: Nice stay at the Hilton midtown
text: We stayed at the Hilton when we traveled to NYC for a wedding. The location is wonderful and close to many subway stops. The hotel is very large but there are many elevators that get you to your floor quickly. The room was very nice and we liked all the outlets and plugs. Bed was comfortable and bathroom was very nice. We did not eat or drink at the hotel but would consider staying again if we came back to ny.
